text: Dmitry Fyodorovich Stepushkin (; September 3, 1975 - June 30, 2022) was a Russian bobsledder. He won three medals in the four-man event at the FIBT World Championships with two silvers (2005, 2008) and a bronze (2003). Stepushkin also competed in three Winter Olympics in 2002, 2006 and 2010. Stepushkin was born in Chkalovsk, Russia. Stepushkin died on June 30, 2022 in Moscow, Russia at the age of 46. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympians for Russia Category:Bobsledders
title: Dmitry Stepushkin
